call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist confirmed representation for the client and provided basic case details. When the caller inquired about insurance coverage, the receptionist offered a transfer to the case manager. Upon finding the case manager unavailable, the receptionist provided her email address for the caller to use for follow-up.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist offered to transfer the caller to the case manager, but then noted the staff member was on another call. The caller opted for an email address instead of a voicemail transfer.
